meta.label: Generate images
meta.description: Generate images from a text prompt using Stable Diffusion

inputRoles.name: weights_folder
inputRoles.label: Weights folder
inputRoles.description: Folder that contains the Stable Diffusion weights

outputRoles.name: image_folder
outputRoles.label: Image folder
outputRoles.description: Folder to save generated images to

params.name: prompt
params.label: Prompt
params.description: Text prompt used to generate the images

params.name: batch_size
params.label: Batch size
params.description: Number of images to generate at once. Larger batch sizes are faster, but require more VRAM

params.name: filename_prefix
params.label: Filename prefix
params.description: Prefix of the filename that the images will be saved as

params.name: clear_folder
params.label: Clear folder
params.description: Delete all existing images in the image folder before each run

params.name: image_height
params.label: Image height
params.description: Height (in pixels) of the generated images. Must be a multiple of 64

params.name: image_width
params.label: Image width
params.description: Width (in pixels) of the generated images. Must be a multiple of 64
